title: ArtyTorrent Pack 56-House Drum Loops 120-129bpm v2-WAV
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 56-House Drum Loops 120-129bpm v2-WAV
------------------------------------------------------

Showing you some more love on Valentine&#039;s Day, this is volume 2 of my general house drum loops ranging from 120-129 bpm. There is more of a techno/trance slant in this than the previous pack, but still some great funky loops too.

Torrent contains 4 RAR files with 151 loops
-------------------------------------------
DDT 4 On The Floor 120-129 (68 loops)
Misc House 120-129 (42 loops)
Tech Trance 120-129 (30 loops)
Ueb Brazil Elec House 120-129 (11 loops)

Just FYI, the Brazil Electro sample CD is interesting but has a ludicrous title. It contains hardly anything that&#039;s electronic. The samples have a South American vibe, but everything but the drum loops included here was recorded live.
DDT stands for "Designer Dance Tools", a really good disc from Sony.

All samples have been normalized and acidized and are 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz, looped precisely and containing the approx bpm in the filenames.

The samples are from CDs produced by Sonic Foundry/Sony, EastWest, and Ueberschall.

--
Arty - "You still love me!"
14th February 2008.
